meanings.definition: A herbivorous dinosaur of the late Cretaceous period, characterized by a bony frill on the back of the skull and a beak-like mouth.
meanings.sent1: The ceratopsian roamed the ancient lands, munching on plants.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the fossils of ceratopsians to learn about prehistoric life.
meanings.sent3: The ceratopsian tried to wear a hat on its bony frill, but it kept falling off.
meanings.sent4: In the children's book, the ceratopsian was depicted as a friendly giant with a leafy crown.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit showcased a life-sized model of a ceratopsian, capturing its majestic presence.
